definition.name: Popover
definition.description: A component that creates a floating content panel that appears when a trigger element is interacted with. It's built on top of Radix UI's Popover primitive and provides a root container for the popover functionality.

properties.description: Inherits all properties from @radix-ui/react-popover Root component

children.description: Must contain PopoverTrigger and PopoverContent components

definition.name: PopoverTrigger
definition.description: The button or interactive element that toggles the popover content when clicked or interacted with.

properties.description: Inherits all properties from @radix-ui/react-popover Trigger component

definition.name: PopoverAnchor
definition.description: An optional element to position the PopoverContent relative to. Useful when the trigger and content positions should differ.

properties.description: Inherits all properties from @radix-ui/react-popover Anchor component

definition.name: PopoverContent
definition.description: The component that contains the popover content. It handles the positioning, animations, and styling of the floating panel.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the content

align.description: The alignment of the popover content relative to the trigger

sideOffset.description: The distance in pixels from the trigger

definition.visualLayout: A floating panel with rounded corners, border, shadow, and smooth animations for entry/exit. The content is padded and has a background color with contrasting text.
